column4: Hello. I have a usb webcam 0c45:602c which is supported by the ubuntu included gspca driver. When plugging it in the driver is loaded and /dev/video0 is created. But I get error messages when trying to use it: xawtv says "X Error of failed request:  XF86DGANoDirectVideoMode", camorama "Could not connect to /dev/video0". It's an ATI video card (if that matters). Any idea?
I'm unable to help you, but I'll have to applaud the phrasing of your question.
there wasn't. We don't get that well-phrased questions a lot.
but alas, this is offtopic---carry on, and good luck.
